text: The 2019 VCU Rams baseball team was the program's 49th baseball season. It was their 7th season the Atlantic 10 Conference. The regular season began on February 15, 2019 and concluded on May 18, 2019. The Rams finished as regular season champions. == Preseason == ===A10 media poll=== The A10 media poll was released on February 7, 2019 with the Rams predicted to finish in second place in the Atlantic 10. {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |align="center" Colspan="3" |Media poll (East) |- align="center" |- align="center" | 1 || Saint Louis || (9) |- align="center" | 2 || VCU || (2) |- align="center" | 3 || Davidson || (1) |- align="center" | 4 || Fordham || (1) |- align="center" | 5 || George Mason || |- align="center" | 6 || Richmond || |- align="center" | 7 || Rhode Island || |- align="center" | 8 || George Washington || |- align="center" | 9 || Dayton || |- align="center" | 10 || Saint Joseph's || |- align="center" | 11 || St. Bonaventure || |- align="center" | 12 || La Salle || |- align="center" | 13 || UMass || |} == Roster == {| class="toccolours" style="border-collapse:collapse;
